LanguageData: <0w0sh_Gun_PP19_Bizon.label>PP-19 비존</0w0sh_Gun_PP19_Bizon.label> <0w0sh_Gun_PP19_Bizon.description>상당히 무겁고 오래된 총기로, 독특한 헬리컬 드럼 탄창 덕분에 탄약 용량이 64발이나 됩니다. 아주 정확한 무기는 아닙니다.</0w0sh_Gun_PP19_Bizon.description> <0w0sh_Gun_PP19_Bizon.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label>PP-19 비존</0w0sh_Gun_PP19_Bizon.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label> <0w0sh_Gun_PP19_Bizon.tools.0.label>손잡이</0w0sh_Gun_PP19_Bizon.tools.0.label> <0w0sh_Gun_PP19_Bizon.tools.1.label>총열</0w0sh_Gun_PP19_Bizon.tools.1.label> <0w0sh_Bullet_Bizon.label>PP-19 비존 탄환</0w0sh_Bullet_Bizon.label> <0w0sh_Gun_MPNine.label>MP9</0w0sh_Gun_MPNine.label> <0w0sh_Gun_MPNine.description>컴팩트한 경량 기관단총입니다. 흔한 탄환을 사용하며, 제어력이 뛰어나 취급이 쉽습니다.</0w0sh_Gun_MPNine.description> <0w0sh_Gun_MPNine.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label>MP9</0w0sh_Gun_MPNine.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label> <0w0sh_Gun_MPNine.tools.0.label>손잡이</0w0sh_Gun_MPNine.tools.0.label> <0w0sh_Gun_MPNine.tools.1.label>총열</0w0sh_Gun_MPNine.tools.1.label> <0w0sh_Bullet_MPNine.label>MP9 탄환</0w0sh_Bullet_MPNine.label> <0w0sh_Gun_MPSeven.label>MP7</0w0sh_Gun_MPSeven.label> <0w0sh_Gun_MPSeven.description>방탄 장비를 뚫기 위해 설계된 소형 SMG입니다. 기본으로 40발 탄창을 장착합니다.</0w0sh_Gun_MPSeven.description> <0w0sh_Gun_MPSeven.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label>MP7</0w0sh_Gun_MPSeven.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label> <0w0sh_Gun_MPSeven.tools.0.label>손잡이</0w0sh_Gun_MPSeven.tools.0.label> <0w0sh_Gun_MPSeven.tools.1.label>총열</0w0sh_Gun_MPSeven.tools.1.label> <0w0sh_Bullet_MPSeven.label>MP7 탄환</0w0sh_Bullet_MPSeven.label> <0w0sh_Gun_PNinety.label>P90</0w0sh_Gun_PNinety.label> <0w0sh_Gun_PNinety.description>독특한 박스형 디자인에, 총 상단에 장착된 50발 매거진이 특징입니다. 이 매력적인 조합으로 많은 이들의 선택을 받고 있습니다.</0w0sh_Gun_PNinety.description> <0w0sh_Gun_PNinety.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label>P90</0w0sh_Gun_PNinety.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label> <0w0sh_Gun_PNinety.tools.0.label>손잡이</0w0sh_Gun_PNinety.tools.0.label> <0w0sh_Gun_PNinety.tools.1.label>총열</0w0sh_Gun_PNinety.tools.1.label> <0w0sh_Bullet_PNinety.label>P90 탄환</0w0sh_Bullet_PNinety.label> <0w0sh_Gun_FMGNine.label>FMG-9</0w0sh_Gun_FMGNine.label> <0w0sh_Gun_FMGNine.description>독특한 접이식 구조 덕분에 휴대성이 뛰어난 SMG입니다.</0w0sh_Gun_FMGNine.description> <0w0sh_Gun_FMGNine.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label>FMG-9</0w0sh_Gun_FMGNine.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label>
